title: Downton Abbey
creator_credit: Carnival Films, Carnival Films & Television and ITV Studios
brief_description: A chronicle of the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the post-Edwardian era—with great events in history having an effect on their lives and on the British social hierarchy.
creator_credit_for_label: Carnival Films, Carnival Films & Television and ITV Studios
